name: Habitat for Humanity Restore
hours: Wednesday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM Thursday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM Friday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
materials: Aluminum Cans; Carpet; Ceiling Tiles; Ceramic Tiles; Clothing; Construction Materials (Reuse); Gift Bags; Furniture; Household Goods; Linoleum; Ornaments; Porcelain; Reusable Appliance Donation; Sporting Goods; Children's Toys; Car Donation; Windows; Wood; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Computer Peripherals; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: The ReStore raises funds by selling merchandise and, after expenses, uses all profits to build more homes.  Habitat for Humanity also provides families an opportunity to buy building materials that they may not otherwise be able to afford. This will help raise the standards of housing. By recycling goods that would have been sent to a landfill, the ReStore also helps reduce waste disposal costs. If you have materials to donate, please call for more information. The Habitat ReStore takes most materials and the staff will be glad to talk with you.
